name: Agentic Toolkit

author: Anthropic

variants.name: lite
variants.title: Agentic Toolkit - Lite

variants.recommended_for: Minimal CI/CD pipelines, embedded systems, low-resource environments

variants.name: standard
variants.title: Agentic Toolkit - Standard
variants.description: Standard variant with all 13 agents and 8 core production skills

variants.name: pro
variants.title: Agentic Toolkit - Pro
variants.description: Pro variant with all 13 agents and all 14 skills for maximum capabilities
variants.recommended_for: Advanced users, designers, developers requiring full feature set
